author: Special Correspondent
text:
Anbumani Ramadoss also promises agro-economic zones, loan waiver

Promising a slew of measures for the agricultural sector to alleviate the problems faced by the farmers, Pattali Makkal Katchi leader Anbumani Ramadoss on Sunday said his party, if voted to power, would go in for scientific approach in farming and strive to make it a profitable venture. The PMK would bring out a separate budget for agriculture, he added.
title: ‘Will strive to make farming profitable’
